summary: A re-texture to glass armor to be red and black
descriptionHtml:
This is meant to go along with my other mod, Tainted Glass Weapons:

http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6732

MOD BY: McMUFFINMARAUDER
----------------
1. INFO
2. INSTALLATION
3. UNINSTALLATION
----------------
1. Info

TAINTED GLASS ARMOR

This mod was created by McMuffinMarauder, It is a retexture of Glass Armor to be red and black.
Please enjoy (:

2. Installation

Extract the texture folder into your: Skyrim\\data\\ archive.

3. Uninstallation

 Open the texture folder in your skyrim\\data\\ archive and delete \"glass\".

Thanks for downloading the Tainted Glass Armor Mod, please endorse!

4. Notes

You have my permission to edit/use this file in anyway, just give credit to me where it is due :D.

----------------
-McMuffinMarauder
author: McMuffinMarauder
